ygData.subject: Re: Intensify Death
ygData.msgSnippet: at L23 buy shock of poison and keep it on you (your pet spell too).  they are the whole reason for turning L24.  i just got shock today- wow!  its pretty hip.
ygData.messageBody:
at L23 buy shock of poison and keep it on you (your pet spell too). they
are the whole reason for turning L24. i just got shock today- wow! its
pretty hip. dd for 146 hp at 100 mana.

belphenor



>From: Fitzroy <fitzroy69@...>
>
>Damn I am about to be 23rd and I am really looking forward to 24th, what do
>you folks reccomend
>for spells at that level, Also I don't really know what equipment i should
>be using. I am the only
>necromancer I know.
>
>
>Belsarius
>Tarew Marr
